title: Is Bert Pushing Back His Wedding Date...Again?!
description:
Bert and his fiancée Tiffany have had several conversations about their future wedding. The last time we spoke to Bert, he mentioned they pushed back their date. Well today, they might be doing the same thing again. But why is this happening? Kristin thinks she might know the answer.
